body_html:
In the above code snippet you are performing Ghost Batch Normalization since virtual_batch_size is not None. This creates virtual sub-batches that are normalized separately with shared gamma, beta, and moving average.

The main benefit of acquiring the statistics on small virtual batches instead of the real large batch is to reduce the generalization error. It is noted in the paper the full batch statistics need to be used for inference. This is the reason that you need to use multiples of virtual_batch_size for inference.
